title: Korean Champ Names
body:
I changed the language on my client to Korean. I forgot about the fact that I can't search for champs in english...

Is there a list of champs translated from english to the korean characters (words) so I can copy and paste them to pick/ban my champs? I'm just looking through the list for now, but it'd be much easier to do it that way.

Thanks in advance for the help.

replies.body: We don't support modifications or language packs for unsupported regions, so I wouldn't have a list to offer.  I recommend sticking to [languages available to your region](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language), as you might end up running into issues like crashes that we couldn't assist with.  Be careful!

Oh, thanks for that list! I can change it back if need be. Is it a problem for me to have it in Korean, other than the possible issues? I don't want to get banned or anything :( I just like the Korean voices and announcements and stuff.
hey man can you give me the list too ?
